about_the_game:
Delete Virus; combines the pleasure elements of rhythm and action to give the player a thrill, defend against virus attacks, and separate phases with a vaccine attack, so that the player can truly enjoy the rhythm and play without the stress of hitting all the notes.

■ Utilization of existing computer viruses
A stage with the motif of a real computer virus that was popular, and various virus character designs and rhythm disturbance elements

■ Two phases: virus attack & vaccine defense, and vaccine attack
A vaccine defense phase that is defended by pressing the same command as a virus attack using the keys of 'w', 'a', 's', and 'd' and a vaccine attack phase that attempts to attack by pressing 'space bar'

■ Interesting story
Shadow of darkness approached 'CAVV' and 'SURIV' who came to take the practical test. Will they be able to complete the test safely and fulfill their long-cherished desire?

■ Two phases: virus attack & vaccine defense, and vaccine attack

name: Delete Virus;

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8265U CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel(R) UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8265U CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel(R) UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Let's become a computer vaccine 'CCAV' to fight computer viruses and aim for A+! Rhythm action game DELETE VIRUS; for passing the virus practical test.
